He said he was disappointed in the president's budget proposal. This senator will do everything he can to make sure that the budget is not balanced on the backs of the weak, the vulnerable, the sick or the old who can't afford to heat their homes in the winter, he said.`` This is simply wrong,'' added Sen. I am happy to see the performance profiling capabilities, since that's an area every phone developer must face when building applications, said Lhotka, whose team's first Windows Phone 7 application hit the Marketplace yesterday. Steve Ballmer said that with about 1,000 apps at launch, Microsoft is ahead of its competitors in their marketplace launch phases.

Eric Schmidt Google executive chairman Referring to the Davos shindig, he said that the great regret is that there are not more Chinese leaders here- both political leaders as well as business leaders - in contrast with the number of Indian attendees. He said Google's leadership reshuffle was a`` clarification of roles'' intended`` simply so that we could make decisions more quickly''.

Your Own Boss in 12 Months.`` You have to figure out whether your ego can take bringing another person to the table who's really making decisions that affect your business,'' Eric Schmidt says. Not only do you have to have clearly defined roles for you and your new manager, but you have to make sure those roles are clear to everyone at your company. You don't want employees pitting you and the new manager against each other, or coming to you in hopes of getting a different answer than what they heard from the new executive. It

Iraq. The differences weren't personal, Donald Rumsfeld says. He recalls receiving a book that Henry Kissinger had written, with the inscription,`` To an occasional adversary and a permanent friend.'' When I started working on the book, Henry Kissinger said,` You tell it like it was.' We differed on some issues, and there's nothing wrong with that. It was professional and healthy, Donald Rumsfeld says. Working on the book meant second-guessing his memory. In a lengthy section on the administration's treatment of wartime detainees, Donald Rumsfeld regrets not leaving office in May 2004, after the Abu Ghraib prison scandal erupted, The Washington Post said. Looking back, I see there are things the administration could have done differently and better with respect to wartime detention, Donald Rumsfeld acknowledges.( Reporting by JoAnne Allen, editing by Eric Beech)

Danny Sullivan , editor-in-chief of technology blog SearchEngineLand.com, said Google's`` probably overdue for a major management reorganization.'' The structures between the three have remained exactly the same over the past 10 years-- which might as well be 100 years of Internet time, he said in a blog post.`` It could be that Eric Schmidt wants a break from being the main public face of the company,'' he said. minister of state for antiquities Zahi Hawass said on Sunday. The objects missing from the famed museum included`` a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess'' and parts of a gilded wood statue of Tutankhamun harpooning, Zahi Hawass said in a statement.
